accessibility_about_us.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page.

accessibility_accurate_cross_team_subtit.comment: Label used in stats for cross success percentage (accurate/total)

accessibility_accurate_cross_team_title.comment: Label used in stats for accurate crosses per match

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_subtit.comment: Label used in stats for Successful long balls percentage. accurate/total.

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_team_s.comment: Label used in stats for successful long balls percentage (accurate/total)

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_team_t.comment: Label used in stats for accurate long balls per match

accessibility_accurate_long_balls_title.comment: Label used in stats for accurate long balls per 90

accessibility_accurate_pass_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for shot accurate passes per 90 min

accessibility_advertise.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about how to buy advertising.

accessibility_aerials_won_percent.comment: Stat indicating how many aerial duels the player or team has won

accessibility_age_confirmation.comment: Popup header - used when a user needs to consent to being 18+.

accessibility_age_confirmation_button_ne.comment: Button indicating if user is below the age limit. The placeholder is the age. So it can be "Below 18"

accessibility_age_confirmation_button_po.comment: Button indicating if user is above the age limit. The placeholder is the age. So it can be "18+" or "18 and over"

accessibility_age_confirmation_subtitle.comment: Popup subtext - used when a user needs to verify his age to display betting odds
accessibility_age_confirmation_subtitle.english: To display odds we need to verify your age
accessibility_age_confirmation_subtitle.value: Per visualizzare le quote dobbiamo verificare la tua età

accessibility_alerts_disabled.comment: Meant for VoiceOver. Lets the user know that a match has alerts off when in the detailed match-controller

accessibility_alerts_enabled.comment: Meant for VoiceOver. Lets the user know that a match has alerts on when in the detailed match-controller

accessibility_all_competitions.comment: Label as a header for all the leagues/tournaments/competitions that are playing on a particular day.

accessibility_all_leagues.comment: Header indication you can set alerts that applies to all your favorite leagues

accessibility_all_players.comment: Header indication you can set alerts that applies to all your favorite players

accessibility_all_set_text.comment: The user is done guessing who the winners will be and gets the option to sign in to save their predictions.
accessibility_all_set_text.english: All set! Sign in to save your predictions.
accessibility_all_set_text.value: Tutto pronto! Accedi per salvare le tue previsioni.

accessibility_all_stats.comment: Text shown on a link that lets the user see all the stats.

accessibility_all_teams.comment: Header indication you can set alerts that applies to all your favorite teams

accessibility_app_notifications_off_desc.comment: Text appearing when app notifications are off.
accessibility_app_notifications_off_desc.english: You have disabled Notifications for FotMob
accessibility_app_notifications_off_desc.value: Hai disattivato le notifiche per FotMob

accessibility_assist_by.comment: Shown in match facts when a player got an assist for a goal. Example: "Assist by Lionel Messi"

accessibility_attacking_threat.comment: Used as header for Momentum / Attacking Threat graph in match facts. As the match ebbs and flows, this statistic tracks how likely the team in possession is to score a goal.

accessibility_attempt_saved.comment: A shot result description (attempt saved by keeper)

accessibility_by_date.comment: Text shown on toggle that shows matches in a league sorted by date.

accessibility_by_round.comment: Text shown on toggle that shows matches in a league or tournament sorted by round.

accessibility_calendar_hint.comment: Meant for VoiceOver. Hint for a calendar button where the user can change which the date for the matches they want to see
accessibility_calendar_hint.value: Guarda gli incontri in altre date

accessibility_career_stats.comment: Text shown on tab header for tab that shows the career stats for a player.

accessibility_careers.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about career opportunities.

accessibility_change_language_explanatio.comment: Label indicating you can change the language of the app
accessibility_change_language_explanatio.english: Continue to Settings and tap Language to select your preferred language for FotMob.\n\nIf no language setting is available, go to your device language settings to first set a preferred language.
accessibility_change_language_explanatio.value: Continua su Impostazioni e tocca Lingua per selezionare la lingua preferita per FotMob.\n\nSe non è disponibile alcuna impostazione della lingua, vai alle impostazioni della lingua del dispositivo per impostare prima una lingua preferita.

accessibility_city.comment: Text shown for venue on a match if do not have a link to it.

accessibility_club_team.comment: This is a header to indicate the team club a player plays on when he is playing for the national team. So for Ronaldo it would be "Club => Manchester United". Feel free to translate it to the same as the "Team" translation if Team and Club is the same in your language.

accessibility_coach_win_percentage.comment: Percentage of games won out of total played.

accessibility_company.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about our company.

accessibility_cookie_policy.comment: Text shown on link that redirects to the page that shows the cookie policy document.

accessibility_createleaguepopup_type_the.english: Type the name of the league below
accessibility_createleaguepopup_type_the.value: Digita il nome della lega qui sotto

accessibility_crosses_succeeeded.comment: Number of successful crosses for a player in a match

accessibility_crosses_succeeeded_accurac.comment: Number of successful crosses for a player in a match measured in percent

accessibility_date.comment: Text shown in table header for cells that show the date a match was played.

accessibility_days.comment: A label below a number indicating how many days are left until tournament starts

accessibility_defending.comment: A section header for defending stats for a football player. Below are things like tackles and recoveries

accessibility_defensive_actions.comment: Football (soccer) stat to describe how many defensive contributions a player has made. A defensive contribution is an attempt to win back possession of the ball, like tackles, interceptions, clearances, and blocks. Sometimes called defensive action.

accessibility_defensive_actions_explaine.comment: Explains what defensive contributions are. Use the same terminology as in the "defensive_actions" and the other relevant stat names.
accessibility_defensive_actions_explaine.english: Defensive contributions is the sum of attempted tackles, blocks, clearances, and interceptions.
accessibility_defensive_actions_explaine.value: Le azioni difensive comprendono tutti i tentativi di scivolata, contrasto, spazzate e intercetti.

accessibility_delete_account.comment: Button that the user can click to delete his FotMob account so all his data is removed from our servers.

accessibility_delete_account_auth_prompt.comment: Button that the user can click to log out and delete his FotMob account so all his data is removed from our servers.
accessibility_delete_account_auth_prompt.english: You will be asked to log in again to verify your identity before we can delete your data.
accessibility_delete_account_auth_prompt.value: Ti richiederemo di accedere di nuovo per verificare la tua identità prima di eliminare i tuoi dati.

accessibility_delete_account_description.comment: Button that the user can click to log out and delete his FotMob account so all his data is removed from our servers.
accessibility_delete_account_description.english: Are you certain you wish to delete your account? This cannot be undone.
accessibility_delete_account_description.value: Vuoi davvero eliminare l'account? L'azione non sarà reversibile.

accessibility_detailed_goal_data.comment: Used for expandable button on goal types in player profile.

accessibility_detailspage_group_stage.comment: Heading over readonly view of the users preditions on the group stage

accessibility_detailspage_reset.comment: Text on button for users to reset their current predictions.

accessibility_direct_free_kick.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored via a free kick.

accessibility_dribbled_past.comment: This is a statistic where we list the number of times a defender was dribbled past by an opponent.

accessibility_duel_won_percent.comment: Duel over the possession of the ball where a player wins the ball

accessibility_effective_clearance_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for clearances per 90

accessibility_enable_push_description_li.comment: Description for push reminder for live activities
accessibility_enable_push_description_li.english: Enable push notifications to get live match updates on your lock screen
accessibility_enable_push_description_li.value: Abilita le notifiche push per ricevere gli aggiornamenti in tempo reale sulle partite nella schermata di blocco

accessibility_europa_conference_league_p.comment: This is a brand new league by UEFA. Details here:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Europa_Conference_League. Indicates that the team can participate in the playoffs for this tournament.

accessibility_events.comment: Used as a header for a tab that lets the user see the events log for a match. Keep it short.

accessibility_expected_goals_non_penalty.comment: Expected goals from shots that are not penalties. Keep the "xG" part as it is.

accessibility_expected_goals_on_target_f.comment: Keep xGOT in the translation and check translation of expected_goals_on_target. This is a keeper stat and it is the Expected Goals on Target value of the opposition team. So if a keeper has conceded 1 goal and the opposition team has a xGOT value of 2.2 the keeper has done well since based on xG on target they should have scored 2.2 goals.
Label used in stats for expected goals on target conceded per 90 min for keepers.
accessibility_expected_goals_on_target_f.value: Tiri nello specchio subiti attesi ogni 90

accessibility_facts.comment: The main tab for the match facts. Needs to be kept short.

accessibility_fast_break.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored as part of a counter attack.

accessibility_favorites_widget_display_b.comment: Used as the display body for the favorites widget in the widget selection menu. Body of a widget that shows the matches you are following.
accessibility_favorites_widget_display_b.english: View the matches you follow with live updates
accessibility_favorites_widget_display_b.value: Vedi le partite che segui con aggiornamenti in tempo reale

accessibility_favorites_widget_display_t.comment: Used as the display name for the favorites widget in the widget selection menu. Title of a widget that shows the matches you are following.

accessibility_fifa_rank.comment: Used as header for a list that displays all countries and their respective fifa ranking (e.g 1st - Belgium)

accessibility_finals_loser.comment: Description of team that lost match. Eg. "Loser SF1 vs Loser SF2"

accessibility_first_extra_time_half_shor.comment: Used for first extra time half short name in matchfacts. Must be as short as possible as it's a button title for pretty small toggle buttons

accessibility_first_half_short.comment: Used for first half short name in matchfacts. Must be as short as possible as it's a button title for pretty small toggle buttons

accessibility_follow_in_the_app.comment: Text shown in predictor to make the user want to download the app.

accessibility_follow_in_the_app_descript.comment: Describes the app so the user will want to download it.
accessibility_follow_in_the_app_descript.english: Access your predictions, points and leagues straight from your Android/iOS FotMob app.
accessibility_follow_in_the_app_descript.value: Accedi ai tuoi pronostici, punti e campionati direttamente dalla tua app FotMob per Android/iOS.

accessibility_follow_leagues.comment: Header in the onboarding where you can choose your favorite leagues

accessibility_follow_leagues_to_set_noti.comment: Used for subtitle on toast from settings if user is not following any leagues.
accessibility_follow_leagues_to_set_noti.value: Segui i campionati per impostare le notifiche

accessibility_follow_players_to_set_noti.comment: Used for subtitle on toast from settings if user is not following any players.
accessibility_follow_players_to_set_noti.value: Segui i giocatori per impostare le notifiche

accessibility_follow_teams_to_set_notifi.comment: Used for subtitle on toast from settings if user is not following any teams.
accessibility_follow_teams_to_set_notifi.value: Segui le squadre per impostare le notifiche

accessibility_fotmob_is_the_essential_ap.comment: Text shown in predictor to make the user want to download the app.
accessibility_fotmob_is_the_essential_ap.english: FotMob is the essential football app.
accessibility_fotmob_is_the_essential_ap.value: FotMob è l'app di calcio essenziale.

accessibility_fouls_committed_per_90.comment: This is a number for how many free kicks a player concedes on average during 90 minutes

accessibility_fouls_per_match.comment: Label used in stats for fouls per match

accessibility_fouls_won.comment: Number of fouls a player has won in a match

accessibility_from_corner.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored from a corner.

accessibility_full_table.comment: String indicating that we will show a complete standings table with all the columns. See translation for short_table

accessibility_fullscreen.comment: Button text - click on it to open play-by-play in fullscreen.

accessibility_get_the_app.comment: Shown above the FotMob app download links.

accessibility_gfx_season_stats.comment: Used as a title on graphics card for with season stats. Very limited room. Find shortest possible version

accessibility_goal_diff_title.comment: Label for goal difference stat (goals scored minus goals conceded).

accessibility_goal_type.comment: Used for goal types in player profile

accessibility_goalkeeping.comment: This is a header for goalkeeper stats like saves, goals conceded and more. May be translated as "Keeper stats" or "Goalkeeper stats" if there isn't a good translation for this.

accessibility_goals_and_assists.comment: Label used in stats for the sum of goals and assists

accessibility_goals_and_assists_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for the sum of goals and assists per 90 min

accessibility_goals_conceded_per_90.comment: Label used in stats for goals conceded per 90 for keepers.

accessibility_goals_per_90_subtitle.comment: Label used in stats for expected goals per 90 min

accessibility_goals_per_90_title.comment: Label used in stats for goals per 90 min

accessibility_goals_prevented.comment: Label used in stats for goals prevented for keepers.

accessibility_ground_duels_won.comment: This is a statistic where we list the number of times a football defender won a ground duel as opposed to an aerial duel.

accessibility_h2h_short.comment: Shortname of 'Head to head'. This tab shows how two teams have fared against each other in the past. Needs to be kept short. Use 'H2h' if it makes sense in the language

accessibility_header.comment: A shot type variant. Goal was scored via a header.

accessibility_header_search_placeholder.comment: Placeholder text for a search bar where the user can search for leagues, teams, players and news.

accessibility_hide_all.comment: Button that can be clicked to hide all the leagues you don't follow.

accessibility_highest_rank.comment: Label for field that shows a teams highest FIFA rank value.

accessibility_historical_table_positions.comment: Header indication a team's previous positions in the table. Example here: https://www.fotmob.com/teams/8650/history/liverpool
Header text over graph that shows a team's historical table positions.

accessibility_history.comment: Tab header for page with historical team data.

accessibility_individual_play.comment: A shot setup description. Goal was scored due to a solo effort. One player did it all himself.

accessibility_info_points_give.comment: button to open information about how points are given in a tournament
accessibility_info_points_give.english: show information about how points are given
accessibility_info_points_give.value: mostra informazioni su come vengono assegnati i punti

accessibility_insights.comment: Used as a header for a section which displays insights about each of the teams before a match.

accessibility_insights_average_goals_per.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Average [2.3] goals per match

accessibility_insights_average_possessio.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Although the variable is percentage, do not format this. We localize the formatting of the percentage value automatically. Correct example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have an average possession of [44 %]. Wrong example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have an average possession of [44] %. Where everything inside the brackets are variables.

accessibility_insights_average_stat.comment: The team averages a value for a particular stat. Example (image of Barcelona to the left of this text): "Average [shots on target per match]: [7.8]" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_bad_form_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have lost their last 7 matches
accessibility_insights_bad_form_team.value: ha perso i suoi ultimi %2$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_best_away.comment: The team is ranked some number for away games this season. Example: "Ranked 3rd away from home this season"
accessibility_insights_best_away.english: Ranked %1$@ away from home this season
accessibility_insights_best_away.value: Classificata %1$@ in trasferta in questa stagione

accessibility_insights_best_home.comment: The team is ranked some number for home games this season. Example: "Ranked 1st at home this season"
accessibility_insights_best_home.value: Classificata %1$@ in casa in questa stagione

accessibility_insights_chances_created_r.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [6th] in big chances created ([18] big chances)
accessibility_insights_chances_created_r.english: Ranked %1$@ in big chances created (%2$@ big chances)
accessibility_insights_chances_created_r.value: In %1$@ posizione nella classifica delle occasioni da gol create (%2$@ occasioni da gol)

accessibility_insights_clean_sheets.comment: The team has the record for not conceding a single goal in a match. Example: "Most clean sheets in the competition (5)"
accessibility_insights_clean_sheets.english: Have kept the most clean sheets in the competition (%1$@)
accessibility_insights_clean_sheets.value: Maggior numero di partite con porta inviolata nella competizione (%1$@)

accessibility_insights_goalless_away.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't scored in 4 away matches
accessibility_insights_goalless_away.value: non ha segnato in trasferta per %1$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_goalless_home.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't scored in 3 home matches
accessibility_insights_goalless_home.value: non ha segnato in casa per %1$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_goalless_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't scored in their last 4 matches
accessibility_insights_goalless_team.english: Haven't scored in their last %1$@ matches
accessibility_insights_goalless_team.value: non ha segnato nei suoi ultimi %1$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_goals_conceded_te.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [2nd] in goals conceded per match ([0.7] goals)
accessibility_insights_goals_conceded_te.english: Ranked %1$@ in goals conceded per match (%2$@ goals)
accessibility_insights_goals_conceded_te.value: In %1$@ posizione nella classifica dei gol subiti a partita (%2$@ gol)

accessibility_insights_goals_scored_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [1st] in goals scored per match ([2.1] goals)
accessibility_insights_goals_scored_team.english: Ranked %1$@ in goals scored per match (%2$@ goals)
accessibility_insights_goals_scored_team.value: In %1$@ posizione nella classifica dei gol segnati a partita (%2$@ gol)

accessibility_insights_goals_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have scored 12 goals in their last 5 matches
accessibility_insights_goals_team.english: Have scored %1$@ goals in their last %2$@ matches
accessibility_insights_goals_team.value: ha segnato %1$@ goal nei suoi ultimi %2$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_gone_without_win.comment: The team has not won in a particular number of consecutive away matches. Example: "Have gone 7 matches without a win"
accessibility_insights_gone_without_win.english: Have gone %1$@ matches without a win

accessibility_insights_good_form_team.comment: Displayed next to the icon of the team, so it is implicit that the team is the noun. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Have won their last 7 matches.
accessibility_insights_good_form_team.value: ha vinto i suoi ultimi %1$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_lost_last_matches.comment: The team has lost a particular number of consecutive matches. Example: "Have lost their 5 last matches"

accessibility_insights_not_clean_sheet.comment: The team has not kept a clean sheet (conceded at least one goal) for a particular number of matches. Example: "Haven't kept a clean sheet in 7 matches"
accessibility_insights_not_clean_sheet.english: Haven't kept a clean sheet in %1$@ matches
accessibility_insights_not_clean_sheet.value: Non riesce a mantenere la porta inviolata da %1$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_not_won_at_home.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't won at home in their last (number greater than 2) matches
accessibility_insights_not_won_at_home.english: Haven't won at home in their last %1$@ matches
accessibility_insights_not_won_at_home.value: non ha vinto in casa i suoi ultimi %1$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_not_won_away.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't won an away game in their last (number greater than 2) matches
accessibility_insights_not_won_away.english: Haven't won an away game in their last %1$@ matches
accessibility_insights_not_won_away.value: non ha vinto in trasferta i suoi ultimi %1$@ incontri

accessibility_insights_not_won_team.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Haven't won a match in 4 attempts
accessibility_insights_not_won_team.english: Haven't won a match in %1$@ attempts
accessibility_insights_not_won_team.value: non ha vinto un incontro in %1$@ tentativi

accessibility_insights_penalties_awarded.comment: The team has the record for getting penalties in a season. Example: "Have been awarded the most penalties this season (13)"
accessibility_insights_penalties_awarded.english: Have been awarded the most penalties this season (%1$@)
accessibility_insights_penalties_awarded.value: Ha ottenuto il maggior numero di rigori in questa stagione (%1$@)

accessibility_insights_penalties_concede.comment: The team has the record for conceding penalties in a season. Example: "Have conceded the most penalties this season (13)"
accessibility_insights_penalties_concede.english: Have conceded the most penalties this season (%1$@)
accessibility_insights_penalties_concede.value: Ha concesso il maggior numero di rigori in questa stagione (%1$@)

accessibility_insights_player_average_mi.comment: A player averages some value (typically 60-120) minutes per goal. Example: "[Mohammed Salah] averages [67] minutes per goal"

accessibility_insights_player_average_st.comment: A player averages some number for a stat. Example: "[Lionel Messi] averages [7.2] [shots on target]" %2$@ signifies the stat while %3$@ is the value, so feel free to swap these if that is appropriate for the language.

accessibility_insights_player_chances_cr.comment: A player which is one of the top players in terms of big chances created in the competition. Example: "Erling Haaland is ranked 1st in big chances created in the competition (20)"
accessibility_insights_player_chances_cr.english: %1$@ is ranked %2$@ in big chances created in the competition (%3$@)
accessibility_insights_player_chances_cr.value: %1$@ occupa la %2$@ posizione nella classifica delle occasioni da gol create nella competizione (%3$@)

accessibility_insights_player_goals_scor.comment: A player has the most scored for a competition. Example: "Mohammed Salah is the competition's top scorer (17)"

accessibility_insights_player_most_chanc.comment: A player has created the most big chances for a given team. Example: "[Harry Kane] has created the most big chances for [Tottenham] ([17])"
accessibility_insights_player_most_chanc.english: %1$@ has created the most big chances for %2$@ (%3$@)
accessibility_insights_player_most_chanc.value: %1$@ ha creato il maggior numero di occasioni per %2$@ (%3$@)

accessibility_insights_player_most_shots.comment: A player has created the most shots on target per match for a given team. Example: "[Harry Kane] has the most shots on target per match for [Tottenham] ([1.4])"
accessibility_insights_player_most_shots.english: %1$@ has the most shots on target per match for %2$@ (%3$@)
accessibility_insights_player_most_shots.value: %1$@ ha realizzato il maggior numero di tiri in porta per %2$@ (%3$@)

accessibility_insights_player_most_x_for.comment: A player is the best in a given a stat for a given team. Example: "[Lionel Messi] has the most [yellow cards] for [Barcelona] (6)" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables
accessibility_insights_player_most_x_for.value: %1$@ ha il maggior numero di %2$@ per %3$@ (%4$@)

accessibility_insights_player_rank_in_co.comment: A player is ranked some number in a stat this season. Example: "[Lionel Messi] is ranked [2nd] in [goals] in the competition (21)" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables
accessibility_insights_player_rank_in_co.english: %1$@ is ranked %2$@ in %3$@ in the competition (%4$@)

accessibility_insights_player_saves_per_.comment: A player which is one of the top keepers in terms of saves per match in the competition. Example: "[Allison] is ranked [2nd] in saves per match in the competition ([1.2])"
accessibility_insights_player_saves_per_.english: %1$@ is ranked %2$@ in saves per match in the competition (%3$@)
accessibility_insights_player_saves_per_.value: %1$@ occupa la %2$@ posizione nella classifica delle parate a partita nella competizione (%3$@)

accessibility_insights_player_scored_con.comment: A player has scored in X consecutive games. Example: "[Erling Haaland] has scored in [6] consecutive matches" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables
accessibility_insights_player_scored_con.value: %1$@ ha segnato negli ultimi %2$@ incontri consecutivi

accessibility_insights_player_scored_x_i.comment: A player has scored in X of a team's last Y matches. Example: "[Erling Haaland] has scored in [6] of [Dortmund]'s last [7] matches" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables
accessibility_insights_player_scored_x_i.english: %1$@ has scored in %2$@ of %3$@'s last %4$@ matches
accessibility_insights_player_scored_x_i.value: %1$@ ha segnato in %2$@ degli ultimi %4$@ incontri per %3$@

accessibility_insights_rank_in_competiti.comment: The team is ranked an ordinal number in a particular stat in the competition/league. Example (image of Barcelona to the left of this text): "Ranked [2nd] in [goals scored per match] in the competition ([1.7])"" where text inside brackets ([xxx]) are variables

accessibility_insights_shots_on_target_t.comment: Displayed next to an icon of the team. Example for Liverpool: [image of Liverpool logo] Ranked [3rd] in shots on target per match ([4.2] shots)
accessibility_insights_shots_on_target_t.english: Ranked %1$@ in shots on target per match (%2$@ shots)
accessibility_insights_shots_on_target_t.value: In %1$@ posizione nella classifica dei tiri in porta a partita (%2$@ tiri)

accessibility_overhead_kick.comment: Overhead kick of bicycle kick. Description is here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bicycle_kick.  is an acrobatic strike where a player kicks an airborne ball rearward in midair. It is achieved by throwing the body backward up into the air and, before descending to the ground, making a shearing movement with the lower limbs to get the ball-striking leg in front of the other. In most languages, the manoeuvre is named after either the cycling motion or the scissor motion that it resembles.

accessibility_per_90_bar_explanation_tex.comment: Explanation text for bar graph for a player stat
accessibility_per_90_bar_explanation_tex.english: The bar graph shows how a player compares to other players in their position on each stat for the currently selected competition. A green bar graph indicates they are among the best in their position at that stat, while a red bar indicates they are among the worst.\n\nThe length of the bar graph represents the rank of the player for each stat, based on percentile. Players are compared only against their positional peers from the currently selected competition.
accessibility_per_90_bar_explanation_tex.value: Il grafico a barre mostra il confronto tra un giocatore e gli altri nella sua stessa posizione per ogni statistica della competizione selezionata. Una barra verde indica che il giocatore è tra i migliori nella sua posizione per quella determinata statistica, mentre una barra rossa indica che è tra i peggiori.\n\nLa lunghezza del grafico a barre rappresenta la posizione del giocatore per ogni statistica, in base al percentile. I giocatori vengono confrontati solo con i loro pari ruolo nella competizione attualmente selezionata.

accessibility_stats_comparison_explanati.english:
The Player Traits chart highlights a player's statistical strengths and weaknesses, in comparison to similar players.

Each stat is adjusted on a per 90 basis and includes matches from the past 365 days.

Players are then compared to positional peers from similar leagues, and placed into a percentile ranking. For example, a player with a 90% percentile ranking on Chances Created means that they create more chances than 90% of players in their position in similar leagues.

Full details on comparisons can be read in our FAQ.
accessibility_stats_comparison_explanati.value:
Il grafico dei tratti del giocatore evidenzia i punti di forza e i punti deboli di un giocatore rispetto a giocatori simili.

Ogni statistica è espressa su base 90 e tiene conto delle partite degli ultimi 365 giorni.

I giocatori vengono poi confrontati con i pari ruolo di campionati simili e inseriti in una classifica percentile. Ad esempio, un giocatore con un percentile del 90% nella classifica delle occasioni create crea più occasioni del 90% dei giocatori nella sua stessa posizione in campionati simili.

I dettagli completi sui confronti sono disponibili nelle nostre Domande frequenti.

common_deepstats_explanation.english:
All data is calculated based on stats provided by Opta.

The FotMob player rating is calculated based on more than 100 individual stats per player per match.

A match in the per match ratings is any match the participant has been involved in even if he came on as substitute in the last few minutes.

A player must have played at least 50% of all matches and at least 90 minutes (for the per 90 stats) to be included in the rankings.
common_deepstats_explanation.value:
Tutte i dati sono calcolati sulla base delle statistiche offerte da Opta.

La valutazione FotMob di un giocatore è basata su più di 100 statistiche individuali per incontro.

Ogni incontro in cui un giocatore entra a far parte, anche se per qualche minuto, viene considerato per calcolare la sua valutazione.

Un giocatore deve aver giocato almeno il 50% di tutti gli incontri per far parte della classifica.

common_estimated_transfer_value_descript.comment: The description for the graph we are displaying about estimated transfer value - This is a full breakdown of how estimated transfer value is calcualted. Don't translate "(ETV)"
common_estimated_transfer_value_descript.english:
Estimated Transfer Value (ETV) is our best guess of what a player would be worth if they were sold right now.

It’s calculated using real transfer data and takes into consideration:

• player performance
• their age and future potential
• how often and at what level they play their position
• the strength of their team and league
• how long their contract still runs
• recent development and similar factors

We focus on the player themselves, not rumours, or which club might buy them.

The value is updated regularly to reflect changes in the transfer market over time.
common_estimated_transfer_value_descript.value:
Il Valore di Trasferimento Stimato (ETV) è la nostra migliore stima di quanto varrebbe un giocatore se fosse venduto in questo momento.

È calcolato utilizzando dati reali di trasferimenti e considera:

• la prestazione del giocatore
• la sua età e il potenziale futuro
• la frequenza e il livello a cui gioca nella sua posizione
• la forza della sua squadra e del campionato
• la durata residua del suo contratto
• sviluppi recenti e fattori simili

Ci concentriamo sul giocatore stesso, non su voci o su quale club potrebbe acquistarlo.

Il valore viene aggiornato regolarmente per riflettere i cambiamenti nel mercato dei trasferimenti nel tempo.

seo_build_your_xi.comment: Headline for info box about how to use the lineupbuilder. See [lineup_builder]. In football-related strings, “XI” refers to a team of eleven players (Roman numeral for 11). When translating, it can be replaced with “11” or the local equivalent (e.g., in Norwegian “ellever”), whichever sounds most natural in the target language.

seo_build_your_xi_text.comment: Text explaining how to use the lineupbuilder. See [lineup_builder]. Please keep the \n placements in the English string when doing the translation. When translating, it can be replaced with “11” or the local equivalent (e.g., in Norwegian “ellever”), whichever sounds most natural in the target language.
seo_build_your_xi_text.english: Build your dream XI, pick your team’s next lineup, or plan your transfer window.\nStart by clicking on an empty player and searching for the player you want to add, or by selecting a team to pre-fill and modify.

seo_play_offs_draw.comment: Label as a header for the matches that will be part of a random draw which will decide which teams meet each other in the play off matches.

seo_play_offs_explanation.comment: A description of the new draw format used in Champions League, Europa League and Conference League. Please keep the \n placements in the English string when doing the translation.
seo_play_offs_explanation.english: The play-off matchups are determined by a draw. In each grouping, the two teams on the left are drawn against the two teams on the right to create two play-off matchups. The play-offs are played over two legs, with the winner going to the round of 16.\n\nThere is a separate draw for the round of 16 using the same process.
seo_play_offs_explanation.value: Gli accoppiamenti dei play-off sono determinati tramite un sorteggio. In ogni raggruppamento, le due squadre a sinistra vengono sorteggiate contro le due squadre a destra per creare due accoppiamenti play-off. I play-off si giocano in due partite, con il vincitore che va agli ottavi di finale.\n\nC'è un sorteggio separato per gli ottavi di finale utilizzando lo stesso processo.

seo_play_offs_format.comment: Label leading to an explanation of the new Champions league play-off format

seo_play_predict_prevail.comment: Catchy slogan for the predictor game, used front and center on the predictor game page. Capture the essence of predicting, competing and winning. Be creative! The flow is more important than the order. Try alliteration, but not a must. NEEDS to be separated by periods.

seo_player_added_to_following.comment: Pop up after clicking follow on a player. See translation for "player,match_added_to_following"

seo_player_removed_from_following.comment: Pop up after clicking un-follow on a player. See translation for "player,match_removed_from_following"

seo_player_started_matches.comment: Label below the number of matches a player has been part of starting eleven. Keep short.

seo_playing_home.comment: Text explaining that the first team is playing at home against the visiting team at a given time.

seo_playing_home_at_stadium.comment: Text explaining that the first team is playing at home against the visiting team at the given statium at a given time.
seo_playing_home_at_stadium.english: %1$@ is playing home against %2$@ at %3$@ on %4$@.
seo_playing_home_at_stadium.value: %1$@ gioca in casa contro %2$@ al %3$@ il %4$@.

seo_poll_closed.comment: Letting users know the poll is closed. This is a poll that shown like "Was that a red card?" and the user can vote within a limited time frame. Opposite of "Poll open". See poll_open.

seo_poll_open.comment: Letting users know the poll is still open. This is a poll that shown like "Was that a red card?" and the user can vote within a limited time frame. See poll_closed.

seo_popular_in.comment: Used in search for popular search results. Give the users country.

seo_popular_in_your_country.comment: Used in search for popular search results if we dont know the users country

seo_position_fullback.comment: A label for a player that plays as a left back, right back, left wing back or right wing back.

seo_position_winger.comment: A label for a player that plays on the Wing like Saka on the Right wing.

seo_pre_fill_lineup.comment: Headline for a component containing football teams that can be used to pre-fill a lineup in a lineupbuilder.

seo_pre_fill_with_popular_teams.comment: Headline for a component containing football teams that can be used to pre-fill a lineup in a lineupbuilder with popular football teams.

seo_predict_copy_code.comment: Button label for copying your league code to clipboard so you can share it with others to join your mini-league. See predict_league_code

seo_predict_edit_until_kick_off.comment: Text for the second step in the predictor game, to explain that you can edit your predictions until the match starts.
seo_predict_edit_until_kick_off.english: You can edit your predictions until the match kicks off.
seo_predict_edit_until_kick_off.value: Puoi modificare le tue previsioni fino all'inizio della partita.

seo_predict_league_code.comment: Label for your league's unique code that can be shared with others to join your mini-league. See joinleaguepopup_enter_code

seo_predict_onboarding_apps.comment: Text in onboarding of our predictor game. The placeholder is a league name like "Women's EURO 2025" so the complete string in English will be "Predict Women's EURO 2025 results and compete against friends in leagues!". If the word "Predict" sounds weird in your language, please use "Guess" as a replacement.
seo_predict_onboarding_apps.english: Predict %@ results and compete against friends in leagues!
seo_predict_onboarding_apps.value: Prevedi i risultati di %@ e sfida gli amici nei campionati!

seo_predict_scoring.comment: Title for section explaining the scoring rules of the predictor game. Scoring system/scoring rules also works.

seo_predict_the_full_time_score.comment: Text for the first step in the predictor game, to explain that you're predicting the full-time score of a match.
seo_predict_the_full_time_score.english: Predict the full-time score for upcoming matches
seo_predict_the_full_time_score.value: Prevedi il risultato finale delle prossime partite

seo_predictor_end_of_ordinary_time.comment: Title explainer text specifying the predictions are for the result at ordinary time, not extra time or penalties.
seo_predictor_end_of_ordinary_time.english: Predictions are for the result at the end of ordinary time.
seo_predictor_end_of_ordinary_time.value: Le previsioni sono per il risultato alla fine del tempo regolamentare.

seo_predictor_extra_time_specification.comment: Subtitle text explaining that if the user anticipates a match to go to extra time, predict a draw.
seo_predictor_extra_time_specification.english: If you anticipate a match going to extra time, predict a draw.
seo_predictor_extra_time_specification.value: Se prevedi che una partita andrà ai supplementari, pronostica un pareggio.

seo_predictor_play_button.comment: Button label for starting the predictor game. Must be short and clearly signal the action of predicting match results.

seo_privacy_title.comment: Title for the dialogue where the user can choose their display name in the predictor game, for privacy.

seo_q1of16finals.comment: Indicator in a table who qualifies for the 1/16 Finals (Round of 32). See [roundof32].

seo_q1of8finals.comment: Indicator in a table who qualifies for the 1/8 Finals (Round of 16). See [roundof16].

seo_random_draw.comment: A header indicating matches that have been drawn as part of the random draw deciding who will meet in the playoff. Not to be confused with two teams that plays a match that ends in a draw!

seo_recent_player.comment: Recent player used in the lineup builder.

seo_rematch.comment: Indicates that this is a rematch. In some cups if the first match ends in a draw, they play again in a rematch to decide who will progress.

seo_reminder_turn_on.comment: Button label for turning on reminders when new matches are available to predict

seo_remove.comment: Used to let user know they can remove something

seo_remove_user_from_league.comment: Title for button that a league admin clicks to remove a user from a league

seo_renews_in.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription will renew. From 0 to many days. Use "today" and "tomorrow" for 0 and 1 if that makes sense for that language.

seo_renews_today.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription will renew today. We need this string in addition to the plural string "renews_in" because many languages don't support the "zero" instance which is what we need for "today".

seo_renews_tomorrow.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription will renew tomorrow. We need this string in addition to the plural string "renews_in" because many languages don't support the "one" instance which is what we need for "tomorrow".

seo_restart_now.comment: Text for button that will restart the app.

seo_restore_purchases.comment: Call to action for restoring in app purchases.

seo_resubscribe.comment: Used as call to action for resubscribe bottom sheet.

seo_resubscribe_to_keep_fotmobplus_benef.comment: Used for bottom sheet subtitle when subscription has expired
seo_resubscribe_to_keep_fotmobplus_benef.value: Riabbonati per mantenere i vantaggi di FotMob+.

seo_results.comment: Short title for the dialogue showing the user's prediction scores and results so far.

seo_retired.comment: Indicates players who have retired from professional play

seo_round_of_16_draw.comment: A header indicating matches that have been drawn as part of the Round of 16 draw

seo_running_the_latest_version.comment: Used as a short toast to the user to tell the latest version of FotMob is already installed.
seo_running_the_latest_version.english: You are running the latest version of the app.

seo_save.comment: Outcome after a shot that indicates that the keeper made a save

seo_save_lineup.comment: Text in a button indicating to save the completed lineup builder.

seo_saved_lineup.comment: Text in a button indicating that the completed lineup builder has been saved. see [save_lineup].

seo_saved_lineups.comment: Header text in component containing list of saved lineups for the lineup builder.

seo_saved_penalties_in_shootout.comment: Stat for the number of penalties saved in a penalty shootout.

seo_search_for_any_player.comment: Placeholder string for searchbox in the lineup builder. See [lineup_builder].
seo_search_for_any_player.english: Search for any player to add

seo_search_for_any_team.comment: Placeholder string for searchbox in the lineup builder to start with a pre-filled team. The natural translation in norwegian would be: "søk etter et lag å starte med" See [pre_fill_lineup]
seo_search_for_any_team.english: Search for any team to start with

seo_season_total.comment: Text in a dropdown showing the season total score of a prediction competition, if the text is longer in the translated language use a shorter natural phrase like "total" instead.

seo_second_leg.comment: Used in match facts to indicate that the match is the second of two or more encounters (legs) between the two teams, commonly in the context of knockout or playoff competitions.

seo_seconds_countdown.comment: see [available_in]. A label below a number indicating how many Seconds left til the next week tournament starts. Use the plural form in the given language.

seo_share_link.comment: Text for the button that opens the share dialogue for the league invite link.

seo_show_club_badge.comment: Checkbox option to show club badge next to the player images in the lineupbuilder. see [lineup_builder].

seo_show_country_badge.comment: Checkbox option to show country badge next to the player images in the lineupbuilder. see [lineup_builder].

seo_sign_in_to_fotmob_predict.comment: Title for the sign in dialogue in the predictor game. Don't translate "FotMob Predict".

seo_sign_in_to_play.comment: Text for the button that opens the sign in dialogue in the predictor game.

seo_since_x.comment: Subtitle used in membership page to indicate since which *year* they became a lifetime supporter. Like "Since 2023".

seo_site_description.comment: This is overall description to be shown in search results on the web etc
seo_site_description.english: FotMob is the essential app for matchday. Get live scores, fixtures, tables, match stats, and personalised news from over 500 football leagues around the world.
seo_site_description.value: FotMob è l'app essenziale per il giorno della partita. Ottieni risultati in diretta, calendari, classifiche, statistiche delle partite e notizie personalizzate da oltre 500 leghe di calcio in tutto il mondo.

seo_site_description_aboutus_careers.comment: Meta description for the fotmob website about careers, where open postitions are listed
seo_site_description_aboutus_careers.english: We are looking for developers, check out our open positions! FotMob is the essential app for matchday. Get live scores, fixtures, tables, match stats, and personalised news from over 500 football leagues around the world.
seo_site_description_aboutus_careers.value: Cerchiamo sviluppatori, controlla le nostre posizioni aperte! FotMob è l'app essenziale per i giorni di partita. Ottieni risultati in tempo reale, calendari delle partite, classifiche, statistiche delle partite e notizie personalizzate da oltre 500 leghe di calcio in tutto il mondo.

seo_site_description_faq.comment: Meta description tag value for FAQ page, with questions and anwsers to frequently asked questions.
seo_site_description_faq.english: Have a question about FotMob, app settings or stats definitions? Check out FotMob's Frequently Asked Questions page for answers and other pro tips!
seo_site_description_faq.value: Hai una domanda su FotMob, le impostazioni dell'app o le definizioni delle statistiche? Dai un'occhiata alla pagina delle Domande Frequenti di FotMob per risposte e consigli professionali!

seo_site_description_for_you.comment: Meta description text for the For You news page.
seo_site_description_for_you.english: Create a personalized news feed with breaking news from your favorite clubs and leagues.
seo_site_description_for_you.value: Crea un feed personalizzato con le ultime notizie dai tuoi club e leghe preferiti.

seo_site_description_latest_news.comment: Meta description text for the Latest News page.

seo_site_description_latest_news.value: Ottieni le ultime notizie, i titoli e le voci di mercato dalla Premier League e dal calcio mondiale.

seo_site_description_league_news.value: Ottieni le ultime notizie sui %1$@ e le voci di mercato.

seo_site_description_league_overview.english: %1$@ table %2$@, results, fixtures, top scorers and more
seo_site_description_league_overview.value: %1$@ tabella %2$@, risultati, incontri, classifica, capocannonieri e altro ancora

seo_site_description_league_playoff.comment: Description for the page showing the playoff tree or bracket for the the given league. With the name, and season as input.
seo_site_description_league_playoff.value: Panoramica del torneo %1$@, calendario partite, risultati %2$@

seo_site_description_league_table.value: %1$@ tabella %2$@, classifiche, forma e molto altro.

seo_site_description_league_transfers.comment: Description for the page with the lates transfers to and from clubs playing in the given league. With the name of the league as input.

seo_site_description_league_trophies.comment: metadata description for league trophies tab.
seo_site_description_league_trophies.english: %1$@ historic seasons with winners and runners-up.

seo_site_description_match.value: %1$@ contro %2$@ il %3$@. Controlla i risultati in diretta, H2H, statistiche della partita, formazioni, valutazioni dei giocatori, approfondimenti, forme delle squadre, mappa dei tiri e highlights.

seo_xg_table_explanation.comment: Text for explaining what the xG table is. The text has newline seperators in it.
seo_xg_table_explanation.english:
The xG table ranks teams based on their expected goals (xG) stats.

• Green numbers mean a team is doing better than expected.
• Red numbers mean a team is doing worse than expected.
• The small number next to the xG value shows the difference between expected and actual performance.

For more details on how it’s calculated, check the FAQ.
seo_xg_table_explanation.value:
Il tavolo xG classifica le squadre sulla base delle statistiche dei loro obiettivi previsti (xG).

• I numeri verdi stanno a significare che la squadra sta andando meglio del previsto.
• I numeri rossi stanno a significare che la squadra sta andando peggio del previsto.
• Il numero piccolo accanto al valore xG indica la differenza tra la performance prevista e quella effettiva.

Per maggiori dettagli su come viene effettuato il calcolo, consultare le Domande frequenti.

seo_xg_table_header.comment: A label for choosing the xG table (also called Justice table) that shows the table based on expected points.

seo_xga_short.comment: Short for expected goals against. Used in table column header so should not be longer than 4 characters.

seo_xmas_week.comment: Title of the week that includes christmas day and boxing day

seo_xpts_explanation.comment: Explanation of the xG table. The text has newline separators in it.
seo_xpts_explanation.english:
Expected Points (xPts) reflect the number of points a team was expected to earn from a match, based on the quality of their chances measured by Expected Goals (xG).

xPts for a match are calculated by simulating possible outcomes using the quality of shots, expressed as xG. The simulation awards points for wins, draws, or losses based on xG.

The xPts are accumulated over the season to form the 'xG-table', also known as the 'Justice table', which provides an alternative view of team performance beyond actual points earned.
seo_xpts_explanation.value:
I Punti attesi (xPt) riflettono il numero di punti che una squadra si aspettava di ottenere da una partita, in base alla qualità delle sue occasioni misurata con i Gol attesi (xG).

I xPt di una partita sono calcolati simulando i possibili risultati ricorrendo alla qualità dei tiri, espressa come xG. La simulazione assegna punti per vittorie, pareggi o sconfitte in base ai xG.

I xPt vengono accumulati nel corso della stagione per formare la "Tabella xG", nota anche come "Tabella della giustizia", che fornisce un'interpretazione alternativa delle prestazioni della squadra al di là dei punti effettivamente ottenuti.

seo_xpts_explanation_green_numbers.comment: Explanation of the green numbers in the xG table. Underlying numbers refer to xG.
seo_xpts_explanation_green_numbers.english: Green numbers indicate better underlying numbers than a team's actual results.
seo_xpts_explanation_green_numbers.value: I numeri verdi indicano prestazioni sottostanti migliori dei risultati effettivi ottenuti da una squadra.

seo_xpts_explanation_link.comment: Link to the explanation of the xG table.

seo_xpts_explanation_red_numbers.comment: Explanation of the red numbers in the xG table. Underlying numbers refer to xG.
seo_xpts_explanation_red_numbers.english: Red numbers indicate worse underlying numbers than a team's actual results.
seo_xpts_explanation_red_numbers.value: I numeri rossi indicano prestazioni sottostanti peggiori dei risultati effettivi ottenuti da una squadra.

seo_xpts_short.comment: Short for expected points. Used in table column header so should not be longer than 4 characters.
